name: GEOLocate
short_description:
This simple utility uses Google Maps to find the longitude and lattitude (reverse geocode) Accounts in Salesforce by all or part of their address and then update the target Account data. 
You will need a custom field to store the logitude and lattitude values in your salesforce Account record. The user will need to know their Salesforce login, password, security code and API names of the address fields and custom longitude/lattitude field.
A Google API key is not required but helps avoid issues with their terms and conditions if more than 2500 queries will be sent in 24hrs (the limit of the free API).
summary: Use Google Maps to reverse geocode Accounts in Salesforce
